invariants.statement: ρ-layers form a directed acyclic meta-graph.
invariants.formal: The layer graph induced by ρ is acyclic and respects parent-child partial order.

invariants.statement: Each Box has a canonical ρ-layer label in NF.
invariants.formal: In NF\_cross\_semantic, there exists a unique ρ\_k such that B is tagged as B^(ρ\_k).
